meanings.definition: A state or feeling of being dissatisfied or discontented.
meanings.sent1: Her disaffection with the new school rules was evident in her frown.
meanings.sent2: The disaffection of the workers led to a decrease in productivity.
meanings.sent3: The disaffection of the cat towards its owner was clear when it ignored all attempts at play.
meanings.sent4: The disaffection in the air was palpable, creating a tense atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The disaffection in his voice made it clear he was not happy with the decision.
